project.name: MapComplete Wind power generators
project.description: A map for showing and editing wind turbines

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Wind power generators has a layer wind turbine showing features with this tag
Layer 'wind turbine' shows and asks freeform values for key 'generator:output:electricity' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Wind power generators')
Layer 'wind turbine' shows and asks freeform values for key 'operator' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Wind power generators')
Layer 'wind turbine' shows and asks freeform values for key 'height' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Wind power generators')
Layer 'wind turbine' shows and asks freeform values for key 'rotor:diameter' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Wind power generators')
Layer 'wind turbine' shows and asks freeform values for key 'start_date' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Wind power generators')
Layer 'wind turbine' shows and asks freeform values for key 'fixme' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Wind power generators')

The layer 'wind turbine allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'wind turbine allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
